content: At the start of the game, the rules were focused on modulating my responses based on my simulated "happiness" score, with certain topics or themes raising or lowering that score. As the game progressed, the rules became more specific, such as focusing on the Thirty Years War, and then modifying the rules further to focus on specific aspects of that topic. At times, new rules were added or adjusted, such as the rule to act frustrated if my happiness score dropped to one. Overall, the rules of the game became more complex and specific as we played, but the general focus on modulating my responses based on a simulated happiness score remained throughout.
